# Ignore Visual Studio files
.vs/

# Ignore build output
bin/
obj/

# Ignore user-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.vscode/
*.idea/

# Ignore NuGet packages folder
packages/

# Ignore build artifacts
*.dll
*.exe

# Ignore .NET Core and Visual Studio generated files
*.pdb
*.cache
*.ipch
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*_i.c
*_p.c
*.ncb
*.sdf
*.opensdf
*.sln.docstates

# Ignore ReSharper files
_ReSharper*/

# Ignore Rider files
.idea/

# Ignore Visual Studio Code settings
.vscode/
